short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate personalized sales emails from LinkedIn profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** NOTE *** You need an authentication key from the publisher in order to use this extension.  If you simply download it, it cannot be used as-is.  Please go to my website to learn more about this.

This extension allows you to craft personalized emails based on information contained in LinkedIn profiles.  

Cold email response rates have plummeted to 1%.  If you simply use existing AI tools that write emails for you, you will only get a small uplift.

RevvRally's secret sauce to your sales success is not a fancy UI nor a hidden AI model, it is deep expertise in prompt engineering and sales development, so you don't write emails that sound "robotic" and fake.

I will work with you until your emails sound natural, with the voice you want.  

Learn more at:  https://www.revvrally.com/solutions/emailwriter
